pr_title: Issue 4775: Add snapshot stage for all release branches

timeline.message:
[issue-4775] Add snapshot stage for all release branches

Signed-off-by: Brian Zhou <b.zhou@dell.com>

timeline.bodyText: This won't work for r0.10, r0.11, etc. You might want to take care of that too.
timeline.author: ravisharda
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]+\.[0-9]+/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

replies.bodyText: Actually, this'd work, as there are + symbols in the pattern.
replies.author: ravisharda
